course_description: Chem 205 will address the origins of electronic orbitals and the quantized energy states associated with molecular motions. How light causes transitions between energy levels will be central to out discussion, illuminating topics from spectroscopy to the Earth's climate and solar energy conversion. Student who withdraw from the lecture must withdraw from the co-requisite laboratory course. *Exceptions to the withdrawal policy require Chemistry Department approval.
prerequisites: [(CHEM_OX 203 and CHEM_OX 203L) or (CHEM 203 and CHEM 203L)] and (MATH_OX 111 or MATH 111) as prerequisites and CHEM_OX 205L as corequisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
